review: a masterpiece  a natural evolution of fc in terms of system more balanced elements expanded skills more playable characters ease to have standby characters catch up in levels the straightforward system makes it a blast to explore the small region again beating everything that moves with the big stick cute chibi sprites memorable soundtrack easy to follow storysc did many things right  sowhy is there a third one on to the next one
game_title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC

review: crying crying and more crying  this game is so beautiful  i loved fc but omg sc made me legit cry because of how beautiful this story is it has so much more emotional depth and it really plunges your heart into despair sometimes but it also brings it up making your heartstrings sing   god when was the last time i was invested in a game like this probably not since nier lol
game_title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC

review: great game great sequel but compared to the first game it has a ton of flaws that are hard to ignore including crusty lowres ui elements a lot of script errors misspelling poor grammar etc the ui will sometimes overlap leaving some text unreadable text boxes in some cutscenes will jitter and worst of all estelle talks like a redditor other than that really good game i highly recommend
